name: Immuno (TheOneFlyingSheep)
description:
Welcome one and all

to my first ever project! I'm a first year Game Design student learning the ropes with all things gaming.

As part of  our Game Development module we were tasked with coming up with a fun game idea and to create this using things learnt in class as well as anything we learnt outside. I chose these theme "It's spreading" and hopefully you can see this in the game itself.

I am by no means a coder (my weakest skill set currently) but I hope you enjoy the game level I created. I certainly had fun making it.

Be kind,  be courteous and above all Enjoy!
